title: Reservations
instructions_content: Use the search bar below to search a reservation or press the book button to create a whole new one
search_instruct:
1. Use the search bar below to search for an existing reservation. 
2. If you want to make a reservation using the existing details press the 'Make booking with existing information' button.
3. If you want to create a whole new booking with new details press the 'Create new booking' button.
4. Click on an instance to open the details page to get more information about the reservation.
instruction_text: Use the text fields below to create a reservation and click the + button to add it. All fields must be filled out for the reservation to be made.
fillout: Please fill out the form information below.
name: Name:
fill_all: Please make sure to fill in all the fields to insert into the database
fill_fields: Please fill all of the fields:
cust_instruct: Browse customers and click the edit button to update any of their fields, or the delete button to delete a record.
new_cust_instruct: Fill all of the fields with the requested information then click the 'add' button. The 'load last customer's information' button loads the information that was previously entered into the fields.
edit_cust_instruct: Update the fields with the new information then click the 'update' button.
